text: @SpeakerPelosi tRUMP ignored pandemic report in 2016,He eliminated pandemic team in 2018.He & McConnell eliminated funds for CDC pandemic research in 2017,20.He now has states report to HHS instead of CDC COVID19 data.His DEATH MARCH is 135000 US citizens from COVID19 HOAX.
